LanguageData.ButcherCorpseFlesh.label: butcher creature
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseFlesh.description: Butcher a creature to obtain its meat, leather, and other body products.
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseMechanoid.label: shred mechanoid or drone
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseMechanoid.description: Shred a dead mechanoid or drone to salvage usable material.
LanguageData.SmashCorpseMechanoid.label: smash mechanoid or drone
LanguageData.SmashCorpseMechanoid.description: Smash a dead mechanoid or drone with simple hand tools to salvage usable material.
